topics.author: 31bee2686368722a0df23600

topics.body:
Done with the English exam, done with exams for today. Two more tomorrow, one more on Thursday.

Weird thing is I can't decide which kind of exam is worse: one with a small number of questions or one with a bunch of questions.

On the one hand it's easier to finish a shorter exam, but on the other hand it's worse for your score if you miss even one question.

On one hand it's harder to finish a longer exam completely in the amount of time you're given, but then again it doesn't matter much if you miss a question or two.

I had both of those today. 
¬_¬

@An exam with a bunch of@ _@open@_ @questions is the worst of all exams@
